name: Additive sympathetic stimulation with multiple sympathomimetics
actions: Avoid combining multiple sympathomimetics when possible.
Monitor BP, HR, anxiety/agitation, and insomnia.
Assess for stimulant use (caffeine/illicit) and cardiovascular risk.

rationale: Combined stimulation can increase cardiovascular and neuropsychiatric adverse effects.

explanation_template: {A_name} and {B_name} can both increase sympathetic stimulation. Using them together may raise risk of hypertension, tachycardia, agitation, and insomnia. Patient factors strongly modify risk.

references.citation: PD stacking: shared sympathetic stimulation domain implies additive sympathomimetic effects.
